Package com.qti.snapdragon.sdk.display

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColorManager.ColorManagerListener
    This listener will inform the calling app when the connection is made to the display service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorManager
    This class provides APIs for changing the device display.
    MemoryColorConfig
    This class provides a storage for Memory Color Attributes.
    ModeInfo
    This class will be used to provide mode information like its id, name, type.
    PictureAdjustmentConfig
    This class provides a storage for Picture Adjustment Config Attributes.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColorManager.ADAPTIVE_BACKLIGHT_QUALITY_LEVEL
    This enumeration provides a list of backlight quality levels
    ColorManager.DCM_DISPLAY_TYPE
    This enumeration provides a list of display types that are supported by these APIs
    ColorManager.DCM_FEATURE
    This enumeration provides a list of features exposed by the ColorManager class.
    ColorManager.MODE_TYPE
    This enum provides a list of Mode types.
    MemoryColorConfig.MEMORY_COLOR_PARAMS  
    MemoryColorConfig.MEMORY_COLOR_TYPE  
    PictureAdjustmentConfig.PICTURE_ADJUSTMENT_PARAMS
